descriptionHtml:
[b]
This is a new version of my Skybreaker set replacer.In this version the helmet is different (a winged great helm instead of the armet) and there is a matching shield ("Tower of the Skybreaker) to go with the rest of the armor.There are some minor fixes in the pauldrons and boots textures as well.
The set has the same enchantments and gives the same bonuses as the Skaragg set making it the most powerful heavy armor in the game.

[color=#ffff00]
[u]Version 2.0 [/u][/color][u]has:[/u]

1.A working ground model for the Ventail of the Skybreaker (helmet).

2.The enchantments and higher armor rating than the Skaragg set.

3.A new model and texture for the shield.

4.A new texture for the cuirass (which is now blue and has the lower part segmented).


[color=#ffff00][u]Important note:[/u][/color]You can only find the boots (Wings of the Skybreaker) and the helmet (Ventail of the Skybreaker) in the game.The rest you can only get via the console.Here is how:

1.Open the console by pressing ~ in game.

2.Type help Skybreaker.This will list the codes for the various Skybreaker armor pieces.

3.Type player.additem followed by the code and the count you wish.Example typingÂ  player.additem 00033E7 1 will give you 1 Skybreaker cuirass
(Bulwark of the Skybreaker).

[color=#ffff00]PS[/color].The console lists two different codes (with different models) for the Skybreaker boots.If you got the wrong one,simple try the other code.


[color=#ffff00][u]Issues[/u]:[/color]

1.There seems to be a conflict between this mod and my Selna replacement mod.The Selna helmet turns invisible if SkybreakerReplacer.esp is loaded [u]after[/u] Selna Replacer.esp.Simply move SkybreakerReplacer.esp [u]above[/u] Selna Replacer.esp in the loading order to your Enderal launcher.


[color=#ffff00][u]Note[/u]:[/color]There is only one model for the female cuirass and boots so the armor retains the same size and does not change with the weight slider.


[u]Credits:

[/u][color=#6aa84f]LordBaraban[/color] for the Witcher 2 steel armors.
[/b][color=#6aa84f]
[/color][b][color=#6aa84f][b][b]ErikRedbeard [/b][/b][/color]Mail Texture - Grey and Black.
[color=#6aa84f]
[/color][color=#00ffff][color=#6aa84f]Frankfamily[/color] [/color]for the helmet (from his Paladin artifacts mod).
[/b]
[b][size=2][b][color=#6aa84f]Abacus [/color]for the heater shield.[/b][/size]


[u]Tools Used:[/u]

[color=#93c47d]1.Skyrim Creation kit.

2.Nifscope.

3.Gimp.[/color][/b]
author: Medtech
